content: make your own felted wool dryer balls this pattern is made amigurumi style you will need to make a ball of yarn 9 1/4 inches in circumference to go inside the crocheted pouch the size of the ball after felting will be between 10 and 10 1/2 inches in circumference i keep about 6 felted dryer balls in the dryer at one time i have heard of people using as many as 12 and as few as 2 at a time in the dryer
